title: @Riot Is Taric able to cast Bastion on minions?
body:
On the champion reveal, none of his abilites mention a champion only limit.

On the PBE they do on Starlight and Radiance. However Bastion doesn't seem to have that limit, so Taric should be able to cast it on minions.

Considering what happened with the Morde rework, this doesn't seem to be a mistake?

replies.body: Bastion is Champions only. Taric can self cast it though if he wants to get use out of the spell while alone.

Asking the important questions here. Meddler please respond.

This is good to know, thank you! Good to have the option for solo/jungling if you do not have an ally around. I have a question though:

Do you feel like he has too much defense scaling? I notice that he has a lot of health and armor scaling, which makes armor and health much more efficient on him compared to most champions. Did you ever consider transferring some of the power into his AP scaling? (They look a tad low, probably because of the strength of the defense scaling I just mentioned)

I realize it is important to keep abilities like heals relevant when building mostly support, but putting armor scaling damage on abilities like passive and stun can create a character that deals a lot of damage while offering a huge amount of tank and utility.

The heal had a health scaling before and the shield scales on target health.

He always had a lot of armor scaling too, they didn't really increase that.

They did however more than double the AP ratio on Dazzle and made it AoE to.

As far as I can tell all of his basic abbilities got a little boost, 

The ult is hard to quantify as it is vastly different.
And before the rework he could 1v1 any ad champ late game, which is questionable considering that riot wants adcs to be able to kill tanks 1v1.

ADC can kill most tanks, but Taric, Rammus and Malphite have always been a counter to that.

Every champ has something unique to them, fo some of them that means compenstaing the general weakness of their class.

Will self casting also double the effectiveness of his other abbilities?

Obviously not the area but how about the damage an heal values?

Way to ruin my main. 
You completely changed his play-style. 
This update is a disappointment.

Coming from A REAL TARIC MAIN.
You ruined a great champion. 
Maybe just stick to visuals in the future!
